00019 #ifndef __SVM_RAMP_H__
00020 #define __SVM_RAMP_H__
00021 
00022 CCL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00023 
00024 __device float4 rgb_ramp_lookup(KernelGlobals *kg, int offset, float f)
00025 {
00026     f = clamp(f, 0.0f, 1.0f)*(RAMP_TABLE_SIZE-1);
00027 
00028     int i = (int)f;
00029     float t = f - (float)i;
00030 
00031     float4 a = fetch_node_float(kg, offset+i);
00032 
00033     if(t > 0.0f)
00034         a = (1.0f - t)*a + t*fetch_node_float(kg, offset+i+1);
00035 
00036     return a;
00037 }
00038 
00039 __device void svm_node_rgb_ramp(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd, float *stack, uint4 node, int *offset)
00040 {
00041     uint fac_offset = node.y;
00042     uint color_offset = node.z;
00043     uint alpha_offset = node.w;
00044 
00045     float fac = stack_load_float(stack, fac_offset);
00046     float4 color = rgb_ramp_lookup(kg, *offset, fac);
00047 
00048     if(stack_valid(color_offset))
00049         stack_store_float3(stack, color_offset, float4_to_float3(color));
00050     if(stack_valid(alpha_offset))
00051         stack_store_float(stack, alpha_offset, color.w);
00052 
00053     *offset += RAMP_TABLE_SIZE;
00054 }
00055 
00056 __device void svm_node_rgb_curves(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd, float *stack, uint4 node, int *offset)
00057 {
00058     uint fac_offset = node.y;
00059     uint color_offset = node.z;
00060     uint out_offset = node.w;
00061 
00062     float fac = stack_load_float(stack, fac_offset);
00063     float3 color = stack_load_float3(stack, color_offset);
00064 
00065     float r = rgb_ramp_lookup(kg, *offset, rgb_ramp_lookup(kg, *offset, color.x).w).x;
00066     float g = rgb_ramp_lookup(kg, *offset, rgb_ramp_lookup(kg, *offset, color.y).w).y;
00067     float b = rgb_ramp_lookup(kg, *offset, rgb_ramp_lookup(kg, *offset, color.z).w).z;
00068 
00069     color = (1.0f - fac)*color + fac*make_float3(r, g, b);
00070     stack_store_float3(stack, out_offset, color);
00071 
00072     *offset += RAMP_TABLE_SIZE;
00073 }
00074 
00075 CCL_NAMESPACE_END

00077 #endif /* __SVM_RAMP_H__ */
